** Listing And Smart Shopping Campaign For Google Changelog **
2022-11-29 - version 1.0.1
* [Added] Added On-boarding steps.
* [Added] Added functionality to create a new merchant account and connect existing merchant account .
* [Added] Added functionality to create a new ads account and connect existing ads account.
* [Added] Added functionality to create campaign.
* [Added] Seperate section to manage products.
* [Added] Added dashbaord, faq and chat support.


2021-06-17 - version 1.0.0
* Inital release
